stories.title: New ThinkPad X1 Carbon Has 20-Watt CPU

stories.text: Hello! In OpenAI playground there is an example that writes the continuation of a given text, also a text to summary tool. But I want it to capture the "ideas" in the text and add more words to them. I think if it's already trained to make a summary, it should also do the inverse process. Or do I need to train it for that?
stories.title: Ask HN: How to convert summary to text with OpenAI?
Sweden creates agency to combat fake news ahead of election
Macron declares his Covid strategy is to ‘piss off’ the unvaccinated
Ubisoft is bringing its subscription service to Xbox

stories.text:
It looks like the faker-js github account has been taken over and a new fake version has been published: https://www.npmjs.com/package/faker

This is a popular project with >1.7M weekly downloads.

Please be warned and make sure you have pinned to an older version of the package.
stories.title: Careful: Faker-JS NPM package apparently taken over by spam
BBGO – remove human emotions while trading cryptos, so you can sleep well
World’s fastest blade runner gets no competitive advantage from prostheses
BlackBerry ends support for all its classic smartphones
